title: Day 2 of trying to get in touch with a rioter :O
body:
a rioter sent me a message on my youtube channel a month ago and i only found out recently

i'm trying to get in touch with them :O

pls help

replies.body: We can use your ticket to see if we can reach out to someone for you, but may require some time and patience.  Rest easy and correspond with support in your ticket as they can look for some additional options.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LkBUycQ2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-13T15:53:31.925+0000)
>
> We can use your ticket to see if we can reach out to someone for you, but may require some time and patience.  Rest easy and correspond with support in your ticket as they can look for some additional options.

Thanks will wait it out, hope I didn't miss an opportunity.

I'm not familiar with Youtube's messaging system, but I imagine it should be okay to reply to the message.  I was able to confirm that your ticket has been received.  Hopefully, player support may be able to help find who you're looking for!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LkBUycQ2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-13T15:31:22.190+0000)
>
> I'm not familiar with Youtube's messaging system, but I imagine it should be okay to reply to the message.  I was able to confirm that your ticket has been received.  Hopefully, player support may be able to help find who you're looking for!

You wouldn't happen to know the rioters that manage the "League of Legends Community" channel on youtube would you? These are the folks that messaged me and they could be sitting right next to you and you could just give them a tap on the shoulder :D ?

<i'm quite eager to take them up on their offer so i'm pursuing all avenues including youtube messages, twitter, and riot support tickets to establish contact>
